scripts.password: node -e "const bcrypt = require('bcrypt'); const password = Array(25).fill('+-_!?,.0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz').map((x) => x[Math.floor(Math.random() * x.length)]).join(''); const hash = bcrypt.hashSync(password, 13); console.log({password, hash});"
